doc:
Andy Gibb https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andy_Gibb 0 Andrew Roy Gibb (5 March 1958 – 10 March 1988) was an English singer, songwriter, performer, and teen idol. He was the younger brother of the Bee Gees: Barry, Robin, and Maurice Gibb. Gibb came to international prominence in the late 1970s with six singles that reached the Top 10 in the United States, starting with "I Just Want to Be Your Everything" (1977), followed by three other top 20 singles. Gibb's success was brief due to drug addiction and depression. He died just five days after his 30th birthday. Andrew_Roy_Gibb ( 5_March_1958 – 10_March_1988 ) was an_English_singer , songwriter , performer , and teen_idol . He was the_younger_brother of the_Bee_Gees : Barry , Robin , and Maurice_Gibb . Gibb came to international_prominence in the_late_1970s with six_singles that reached the_Top_10 in the_United_States , starting with " I Just Want_to_Be Your_Everything " (_1977_) , followed by three_other_top_20_singles . Gibb 's_success was brief_due to drug_addiction and depression . He died just_five_days after his_30th_birthday .
